title: Shear line, Amihan, easterlies to bring scattered rains over parts of PH
desc: The Shear Line will bring cloudy skies with scattered rains over the eastern sections of Southern Luzon and Visayas, parts of Mindanao will be affected by the easterlies while the effects of the Northeast Monsoon (Amihan) will be felt in the rest of Luzon, PAGASA reported.

title: South Korean actor Jung Eun-woo passes away at 39, ‘Missed, jealous, sorry’ post draws attention
desc: News News: Jung Eun-woo, beloved South Korean actor known for his roles in 'Sharp' and 'Bride Of The Sun,' has passed away at 39. His last Instagram post, featuring a reflective message, has triggered conversations on mental health and the pressures within the entertainment industry.
